Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/Congress
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, Harrison, Damen, Jackson and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, Van Buren, Damen, Harrison and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey and #93 California/Dodge Temporary Reroute near Diversey/Francisco
ShortDescription: #76 Diversey and #93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Diversey/Francisco, due to street blockage near Diversey/Francisco.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey and #93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Diversey/Francisco, due to street blockage near Diversey/Francisco.

#76 Diversey buses will operate via Diversey, California, Elston, Belmont, Sacramento, Diversey and over regular route.

#93 California/Dodge buses will operate via California, Belmont, Sacramento, Diversey and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/101st
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Drive buses are temp rerouted in both directions via King Dr, 100th, Cottage Grove, 103rd & King Dr, due to street blockage near King Drive/101st

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 100th, Cottage Grove, 103rd and King Drive then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near King Drive/101st.

Allow extra travel time.
